TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HiddenField extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HiddenField Inherits Control Implements IPostBackDataHandler
public ref class HiddenField : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler
type HiddenField = class inherit Control interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示用于存储非显示值的隐藏字段。

span.span: Represents a hidden field used to store a non-displayed value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于存储需要在发送到服务器的所有发送过程中保持的值。The control is used to store a value that needs to be persisted across posts to the server. 它将呈现为``元素。It is rendered as an `` element. 通常, 视图状态、会话状态和 cookie 用于维护 Web 窗体页的状态。Normally view state, session state, and cookies are used to maintain the state of a Web Forms page. 但是, 如果这些方法已禁用或不可用, 则可以使用控件来存储状态值。However, if these methods are disabled or are not available, you can use the control to store state values. 若要为控件指定值, 请使用属性。To specify the value for a control, use the property. 可以提供一个例程, 每次在向服务器发送事件的事件处理程序中, 控件的值发生更改时, 都会调用此例程。You can provide a routine that gets called every time the value of the control changes between posts to the server by creating an event handler for the event. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件在向服务器的各次发送之间存储控件的值。The following examples show how to use the control to store the value of a control between posts to the server. > [!IMPORTANT] > 示例中有一个接受用户输入的文本框, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。The examples have a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/CS/hiddenfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HiddenField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenField/VB/hiddenfieldvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HiddenFieldWebServerControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenFieldWebServerControl/CS/HiddenFieldWebServerControl.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HiddenFieldWebServerControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HiddenFieldWebServerControl/VB/HiddenFieldWebServerControl.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 创建 对象，用于指示不允许使用子控件。

span.span: Creates an object used to indicate that child controls are not allowed.
Always returns an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用于创建用于存储 Web 服务器控件的子控件的对象。 The method is normally used to create a object for storing the child controls of a Web Server control. 在此方法的实现中, 始终返回一个集合, 以指示不允许使用子控件。In this implementation of the method, an collection is always returned to indicate that child controls are not allowed.

para.span: 扩展控件时, 可以重写此方法以支持子控件。

span.span: When extending the control, you can override this method to support child controls.

span.span: Always returns to indicate that this control does not support themes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不支持主题。The control does not support themes. 此属性已被重写以始终`false`返回。This property has been overridden to always return `false`. 如果尝试设置此属性, 则会引发异常。If you attempt to set this property, a exception is thrown.

exception.span: 尝试对此属性进行设置。

span.span: An attempt is made to set this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 窗体页框架跟踪返回`true`到此方法调用的所有服务器控件, 然后在这些控件上调用。The Web Forms page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` to this method call, then invokes the on those controls.

param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的值在向服务器的各次发送之间更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the value of the control changes between posts to the server. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法, 该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 控件的状态已更改。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是类使用的帮助器方法, 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序控件的状态已更改。 The method is a helper method used by the class to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

para.span: 此方法可在派生类中重写, 以便在回发到服务器时引发更改事件。

span.span: This method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events when it posts back to the server.

span.span: When extending the control, you can override this method to render custom content for the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置隐藏字段的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the hidden field.
The value of the hidden field.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定或确定控件的值。 Use the property to specify or determine the value of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定控件的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 在向服务器的各次发送过程中，当 控件的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的值在向服务器的各次发送之间更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the value of the control changes between posts to the server. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法, 该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件显示控件的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display the value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
